Known Issues

  • Spotify AppleScript bug
  • Spotify WEB API limitations
  • PHP Requirement
  • Mopidy

This is the list of current known issues:

Spotify AppleScript bug

  • The local tracks cannot be launched due to a bug with Spotify AppleScript.

Spotify WEB API limitations

  • The Starred playlist is not returned by Web API. Spotify has removed starred tracks and replaced by Your Music. As a workaround, you can create a new playlist (called ‘Starred’ for example) and copy all your starred tracks in it.

  • You cannot have more than 10000 tracks in Your Music.

PHP Requirement

  • PHP 5.5.0 or later is required for authentication. This is because I am using the PHP CLI built-in web server for Oauth process. If you use an older version, there is a workround. Ask for more details if required.

Mopidy

  • Local tracks are not supported by Mopidy, this is a known issue. The workflow will not display local tracks when Mopidy is used.
